dublin_core.dcvalue: This poster presents an innovative real time Teleconsultation System for synchronized navigation of the pages of a web based Oncological Electronic Medical Record designed to provide clinicians a cooperative work tool supporting the oncologic patient management between different hospitals The system embeds additional tools supporting the discussion digital whiteboard chat and a digital audio channel
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
A real time Teleconsultation System for Sharing an Oncologic Web-based Electronic Medical Record.
